source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_00<tab>Omega has selected a new destination.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_00<tab>パクシャ通りのオメガは、次なる調査に向かいたいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_01<tab>Omega expresses a desire to understand the seemingly illogical relationship between the Ilsabard contingent and the imperial population. In order to explore this inconsistency, it bids you teleport your group to Camp Broken Glass in Garlemald.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_01<tab>オメガから第二の疑問を提示され、ともにガレマルドにやってきた。キャンプ・ブロークングラスの「オメガ」と話し、同行させよう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_02Your demanding mechanical companion insists that understanding its current issue will require questioning a representative of both the contingent and the Empire. With the implacable Omega and the shivering Alpha in tow, you set off to find some suitable interviewees.

※You must be accompanied by Omega and Alpha to complete this task. Speak with either of them at Camp Broken Glass should you become separated.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_02オメガとアルファを連れて聞き込みを始めた。ふたりを連れた状態で、キャンプ・ブロークングラスにいる、派遣団員および帝国民と話そう。

※同行状態が解除された場合、キャンプ・ブロークングラスの「オメガ」か「アルファ」に話しかけることで同行を再開できます。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_03The men you question both remember you from an earlier visit, although with distinctly different emotions. Both, however, react to Omega's assessments in similarly unexpected fashion, providing the confused machine with a bounty of data to analyze. Once again, Omega asks that you relocate to a quiet place where it can process this new input.

※You must be accompanied by Omega and Alpha to complete this task. Speak with either of them at Camp Broken Glass should you become separated.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_03<tab>それぞれの立場の者から話を聞いた。キャンプ・ブロークングラスの指定地点で、同行している「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_04<tab>In the midst of discussing the interviewees' “inconsistent” responses and the unpredictability of mortal hearts, Omega exhibits a precipitous drop in energy supply─it would seem the cold weather affected its inner workings more than it anticipated. Omega commands you to apply friction to its outer frame, in an effort to raise its critically low core temperature.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_04<tab>会話の途中で、オメガの動きが鈍くなった。キャンプ・ブロークングラスの「オメガ」をこすろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_05<tab>Crisis averted, you confirm the direction of Omega's next destination: Victors' Spoils. The diminutive model clatters off with the feathery Alpha in close proximity, determined to learn more of burial customs and cognitive complications.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_05<tab>オメガが、にわかに復活した。ガレマルドの臣の褒賞で「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_06<tab>You arrive at Licinia's gravesite to find an imperial soldier paying his respects. Manius introduces himself, and Omega immediately subjects him to a barrage of probing questions. Although taken aback, Manius nevertheless does his best to respond, his honest answers leading Omega to the conclusion that it is not man who commands the strength of his heart, but rather emotion that controls the man...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_06<tab>オメガは、墓参りに来ていたマニウスに質問をぶつけた。臣の褒賞の「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_07<tab>Satisfied that no further revelations are forthcoming from Camp Broken Glass, Omega indicates its readiness to proceed to its third and final query. This last issue concerns the dearth of information regarding the ancients, and what their full impact on the Final Days might have been. Omega determines that the moon-dwelling Loporrits represent the best source of additional data, and your teleportation spell soon has you materializing inside Bestways Burrow.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_07<tab>オメガから最後の疑問を提示され、ともに嘆きの海にやってきた。ベストウェイ・バローの「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_08<tab>In a stroke of good fortune, Omega's need for observational assistance is immediately filled by the appearance of an enthusiastic Growingway. They set off to examine the burrow's technology, and Omega returns from his Loporrit-guided tour with further questions about the ancients' near-ideal society. The ever-inquisitive machine now wishes to speak with “the watcher,” and agrees to your suggestion to ride Argos to the entity's tower.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_08<tab>オメガは、グローウィングウェイに質問をぶつけまくった。ベストウェイ・バローの前で「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_09<tab>Putting aside the potential ramifications of a fluff-based hierarchy, you manage to convince the stubborn Argos to bear you and your companions to the watcher's abode. The being in question patiently waits to be addressed, seemingly bemused by his unexpected visitors.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_09<tab>アルゴスに頼み込んで、オメガたちも運んでもらえるようにした。嘆きの海の監視者の館にいる「月の監視者」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_10<tab>In response to Omega's query, the watcher suggests that a recounting of your experiences might paint a more vivid picture of the ancients and their deeds. The tales you share only serve to confound Omega further, however, as it struggles to reconcile its objective assessment of events with your highly personal perspective. The oft-beeping model nevertheless accepts the data which you and the watcher have provided, and states that its investigation is now completed. The time has come to make a return to Thaumazein.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_10<tab>月の監視者も交えて、古代人たちについて話した。ラヴィリンソスのタウマゼインにいる「ビッグス」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_11Barely have Biggs and Wedge welcomed you back to Sharlayan when they explain that an urgent matter calls them away. You accompany them to their waiting airship, with Omega sharing the results of its investigations while you walk. Omega concludes that Sir's illogical actions strongly indicate the presence of a “heart,” which it has now defined as “a phenomenon which influences one's interpretation of reality.”

Upon arriving at the vessel, Biggs presses Omega to hold up its part of the bargain, and it finally provides you with a translation of the mystery transmission. It is a simple message, of hope and shared joy, the spiritual value of which appears lost on the ever-practical Omicron.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_11<tab>ビッグスとウェッジを見送りに行き、オメガから謎の通信の内容を聞いた。オールド・シャーレアンの知神の港にいる「オメガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_12<tab>With the investigation over and its promised duty discharged, Omega returns to traveling the star with Alpha. Sharlayan, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, Garlemald─the wide world and its many peoples await. There are questions yet to be answered, and the road ahead is long...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SEQ_12<tab>オメガたちは、開かれた世界へと飛び出していった。ふたり一緒なら、ずっと遠くの景色も見られることだろう。そうして手を取り合い、それぞれの答えを探しながら、この星の生命は営みを続けていく。いつか長い旅を終え、優しい海に迎えられるまで。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_000<tab>Kweh, kwe-kwe kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_000<tab>クエ、クク、クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_011<tab>Our next destination will be Camp Broken Glass.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_011<tab>それでは、第二の疑問を追求しにいきましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_012<tab>I desire elaboration on the dealings between the Ilsabard contingent and the citizens of Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_012終末に関する報告書で、ほかにワタシが解せなかったのは、
ガレマルドにおける派遣団と帝国民のやりとりです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_013<tab>The report described the contingent's purpose as the salvation of the local populace. Furthermore, both factions faced a common enemy in the Telophoroi. Why did they not immediately combine forces to their mutual benefit?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_013派遣団には、帝国民を救援する意思があった。
加えて、両者にはテロフォロイという共通の敵もいました。
……それなのに何故、早急に手を組めなかったのか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_014<tab>This inconsistency requires closer examination. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, initiate teleportation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_014本件の調査も、引き続き現地で行いたいと思います。
さあ、ワタシたちを抱え、
キャンプ・ブロークングラスに向かってください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_020<tab>Kweh-k-k-k-k-k-kweeeh...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_020<tab>クククククエエエエエ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_030<tab>Teleportation successful. Evaluating immediate environs. A cold-weather region by Etheirys standards, but significantly less extreme than a star with ice planet classification.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_030到着ですね。
ガレマルド……この星においては寒冷地とされていますが、
全球凍結した星と比べれば、危険性は低いかと。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_031<tab>This body should not be unduly impeded. In contrast to Alpha and his uncontrollable shivering, my frame appears highly resistant to low temperatures.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_031事実、このボディでも活動に支障はなさそうです。
先ほどから微振動しているアルファよりも、
耐冷性能において優秀であることが証明されてしまいました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_032<tab>Retrieving data. Records indicate that remnants of the contingent force and a number of imperial citizens yet inhabit this location.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_032……さて、このキャンプには、
イルサバード派遣団の残存勢力と、保護された帝国民、
どちらも滞在しているそうですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_033<tab>We must speak with representatives from both factions, and explore their respective attitudes. <blip> Proceed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_033まずはそれぞれに類するヒトに声をかけ、
互いについての認識を確認したいと思います。
ガガ……行きましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Omega and Alpha are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_034オメガたちが「同行」を開始します。
クエストを進行させるには、同行者が近くにいる状態で、
目的を達成する必要があります。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_035「同行」は、エリアを移動した場合や、
「同行状態を解除する」を選んだ場合に解除されます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_036解除した場合、もとの場所に戻った同行者に話しかけることで、
再び「同行」させることができます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q1_000_040<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q1_000_040<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_041<tab>Talk.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_041<tab>話す

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_042<tab>Part ways.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_042<tab>同行状態を解除する

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_043<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A1_000_043<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_044<tab>Please approach a contingent member and an imperial citizen. I require input from both perspectives.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_044派遣団に所属する者と、保護された帝国民、
双方に認識を聞いてみましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_045<tab>I recommend you move at a brisk pace. The exertion will raise your body temperature, preventing you and Alpha from freezing to death.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_045聴取に際しては、心拍数がやや上昇する程度に、
走行することをオススメします。
アルファとアナタの凍結を防止するためです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_046<tab>Kw...kwe...kwe-choo!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_046<tab>ク……クエ……クシュン！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q2_000_047<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q2_000_047<tab>同行状態を解除します。本当によろしいですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_048<tab><blip> Has your organic body reached its limit for cold exposure? Restore your temperature equilibrium, then find us again at the center of the camp.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_048ガガ……耐冷温度の限界に達しましたか？
手早くあたためてきてください、
キャンプの中央で待機しています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_049<tab>Kwe-kweh...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_049<tab>ク、クエ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Alpha races off towards the middle of Camp Broken Glass, breath steaming in the freezing air.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_050アルファは震えながら、
キャンプ・ブロークングラスの中央へ駆けていった。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_051<tab><blip> You are functional again? Then let us resume our objective.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_051ガガ……行動可能な状態になりましたか？
では、再度出撃です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_052<tab>Kweh-k-k-k-k-k-kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_052<tab>ククククククエー……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>Omega and Alpha have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_053同行者がまだ到着していない。
近くまで迎えにいって、ともに話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_060<tab>A shadow from the past...?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_060<tab>お前は……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>You should have Omega and Alpha accompanying you before initiating conversation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_061オメガとアルファを連れずに話を聞いても仕方ない。
ふたりを同行させてこよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_062<tab>A shadow from the past...? Yes, I know you from Victors' Spoils!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_062お前は……！
「臣の褒賞」へ押しかけてきた奴じゃないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_063<tab>Have you come to laugh at me!? A wretch who chose to lose Licinia and her sister rather than accept your help...? The fool who ended up reliant upon your charity nonetheless...?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_063お、俺を笑いにきたのか！？
リキニアたちを失ってまで、お前たちを拒んだ……
なのにこうして保護されている、俺を……ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_064<tab>Well, perhaps I <var 1A 02 /var>deserve<var 1A 01 /var> your derision. My compatriots surely scorn my failed conviction.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_064ハッ……いいさ、好きに笑えよ……。
同胞たちだって、俺を蔑んでるに違いないんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_065<tab>I have shamed my people, and brought dishonor upon my nation. I am no better than a kept beast, my pride sold for a bowl of feed...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_065恥さらし、ガレアンの汚点……。
まるで家畜だ……餌のために誇りを売った…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_066<tab>But my soul, nay, <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> you shall not have! I've refused your honeyed offers of a new home! This land is where I belong, and this is where I shall remain!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_066けどな、俺は誓って、魂まで派遣団に売っちゃいない！
まだこの土地に残ってるのが証拠だ。
移送の話だって、すべて断ったッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_067<tab><blip> You demonstrate opposition to the contingent's overtures.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_067ガガ……つまりアナタは、
派遣団と協力関係を構築することに対し、否定的なのですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_068<tab>On what basis do you refuse this cooperation? The data suggests the local populace is struggling to produce the bare minimum of sustenance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_068それは、どういった根拠に基づく判断でしょうか？
報告書によれば、当地における帝国民の自給自足は、
現状、非常に困難です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_069<tab>Have you some secret strategy for survival? Or do your orders compel you to accept your present misfortune?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_069だというのに救援を拒むのは、
ワタシの知らない打開策を有しているからですか？
もしくは、投降不可の命令を受けているのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_070<tab>Wha─? Must I be mocked by a magitek toy now!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_070魔導兵器の模型……？
誰が操ってるか知らんが、馬鹿にしやがって！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_071<tab>No, I have no secret strategy! No binding orders! I but comport myself as any true Garlean patriot would! Uncompromising...unbending...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_071打開策も命令もない、ああ何もないさ！
それでも俺は、ガレアン人として正しい姿勢を……
祖国のための……真っ当な……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_072<tab>...Blast it all.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_072<tab>…………クソッ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_073<tab>Once again, this input is...unanticipated. Let us move aside and process what we have heard.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_073……)) (( )) 02 /var>。
またしても予想外の応対です。
一度、あちらでアナタと確認をさせてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_080<tab>There is naught for me here! I know this! But if I surrender my homeland, then what was it all for...?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_HUNGRYGARLEAN_000_080そう、打開策も命令もない……。
頭じゃわかってるんだ……俺だって……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_090<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_090ん……)) (( )) 02 /var>殿か。
ガレマルドの近況を、確認しにきてくれたのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_091<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...? Come to see how things are progressing, have you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_091ん……)) (( )) 02 /var>殿か。
ガレマルドの近況を、確認しにきてくれたのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_092<tab>I can't speak for the overall strategy, but communication with the locals has become a damn sight easier since Jullus and his soldiers stepped in to help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_092そうだな、大方針はともかく、現場はぼちぼち進んでる。
ユルスたちが取りなしてくれた甲斐もあって、
保護した帝国民と、格段に話しやすくなった。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_093<tab>Oh, we still face our fair share of distrust, of course. Some folk even think we're enslaving minds with our “foreign magicks.” Hmph. We have Anima to thank for putting that idea in their heads.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_093もちろん、反発や不信感が完全に消えたわけじゃない……。
俺たちが魔法で心を操ってるんだと考えてる奴もいる。
アニマっていう前例を知ってるから、余計にな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_094<tab>But all things considered, I'd say we're doing pretty well. Establishing an open dialogue was the first big step...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_094それを加味しても……上出来だと、俺は思ってるよ。
こんなに大勢と、まともに話せるようになるなんてな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_095<tab>Query. You consider this level of progress...acceptable?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_095疑問……そのような中途半端な成果で、
進捗状況は良好だと判断してもよいのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_096<tab>The reality of your efforts falls far short of the ideal. If your aim is to provide efficient succor to the local populace, then absorbing their numbers into your command structure would be the optimal path.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_096帝国民に万全なケアを効率よく提供したいなら、
彼らを自己の組織に吸収し、管理すべきです。
理想と現状が、まだ乖離しています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_097<tab>Oh, I wouldn't want to go that far. We're not looking to take over their nation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_097……いや、いいんだ。
俺は、国境をなくしたいわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_098<tab>If we're to do this the right way, we need to recognize and respect each other's way of life.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_098お互い、向こう側に違う暮らしがあることを認めて、
健全につきあっていければいいと思ってる。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_099<tab>So while it may not be the easiest solution, I agree with the contingent's slow and steady approach. I'm just happy we're saving lives.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_099だから、派遣団の活動も、今くらいの進め方で十分なんだ。
ひとりでも多くの命を助けられれば……とは考えてるがな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_100<tab>I'm Ala Mhigan, but I was also an imperial conscript until not so long ago. Though I was lucky enough to have a decent commanding officer, many Garleans treated “provincials” like we were less than people.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_100俺はアラミゴから来たが、つい最近まで「帝国兵」だった。
そこで信頼できるガレアンの上官に出会えたが、
属州民を人として扱わない奴の方が多かったのは事実だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_101<tab>On the other hand, natives of Ala Mhigo didn't think much of us, either. I guess that's my roundabout way of saying I'm surprised this contingent was even formed in the first place. I feel fortunate to be a part of it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION_000_101同時に、アラミゴ人だって、俺たちを見下してたよ。
それを知ってるからこそ、派遣団の設立には驚かされたんだ。
……参加してよかったと思ってる、心からな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_105<tab>I require time and distance to process this data. Scanning for suitable locations...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_105保護された帝国民と、派遣団の一員……
両者への聴取結果について、あちらで話をさせてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_110<tab>Kweh...? Kwe-kweh, kweeeh?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_110クエ……？
クエエ、クエクエ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_120<tab><bloop> Alpha is absent.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_120<tab>ガガ……アルファが、はぐれているようです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>Omega seems reluctant to continue without Alpha present. Be sure to have the chocobo with you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_121アルファを放っておくわけにはいかない。
同行させてこよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_122<tab>Accessing and analyzing recorded data... Integration complete.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_122<tab>記録……検証……構築……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_123<tab>I have evaluated this most recent input, and made comparisons to our discoveries in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_123先ほどのふたりの発言を、ラザハンでの経験を踏まえ、
ワタシなりに解釈してみました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_124<tab>Consistent only in their inconsistency, the responses from both contingent member and imperial citizen were highly irrational. Conversely, any Omicron considering their predicaments would have echoed my assessment exactly.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_124彼らの論述も、やはり合理的ではありません。
オミクロンに聞かせれば、もれなく全員が、
ワタシと同じ指摘をするでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_125<tab>The divergence from self-evident logic is key...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_125ですが……まさにそういった点……
ワタシたちにとっての「自明の理」と、差が生じていること……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_126<tab>Hypothesis. The illogical relationship between would-be saviors and suffering populace is another result of the unpredictable nature of mortal hearts.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_126それを根拠とし、派遣団と帝国民の奇妙な関係もまた、
心によって形成されているのではないかと推測します。
……いかがですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_127<tab><blip> Any property or ability has inherent advantages and disadvantages.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_127ガガガ……。
どんな能力にも、メリットとデメリットがあるものですが……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_128<tab>Yet never have I encountered such a unique detriment. It appears that those who share your metaphysical capabilities are prone to complicating simple cognitive processes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_128心を有することのデメリットは、極めて特殊ですね。
思考回路に作用し、
認知を過度に複雑化させているように思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_129<tab>An undesirable quality. I will, however, persist in furthering my understanding of the subject.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_129……だとしても、心について学ぶことの意義は失われません。
引き続き、調査を続けていきましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_130<tab>Query. Prior to formulating our next step, I wish to know: who is this “Licinia” the imperial mentioned?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_130質問……次の作戦を立案するにあたり、教えてください。
先の帝国民が言及していた「リキニア」とは？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_131<tab>Acknowledged. To summarize, insufficient data on foreign culture resulted in inadvisable and ultimately fatal action.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_131なるほど。
異民族への知識が不足していたために正しい判断ができず、
不用意な撤退を行い、自滅した個体ですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_132<tab>I witnessed such self-destructive behavior during the course of our planetary conquests. Overwhelmed enemy forces would voluntarily withdraw into perilous regions, leading to a succession of inevitable losses.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_132ええ、ワタシが異星侵攻の先陣を切っていたころにも、
敵勢力がそうやって壊滅したことがありました。
自ら危険地帯へと撤退し、次から次へと爆発四散したのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_133<tab>...Tangential data request. I wish to learn about burial customs. The practice has ever seemed nonsensical, but new data suggests it arises from the same source as your cognitive complications.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_133……それはそれとして、埋葬については経験がありません。
ヒトのそうした行為を不可解に思っていましたが、
何かしらの心が作用しているのだろうと、今ならわかります。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_134<tab>Take me to this Licinia's burial site. It may aid me in understand...stand... <bloop> <bloooooop>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_134要望……リキニアたちの墓を訪ねてみましょう。
学習できることが……ガ……ガガガガガガガガガ……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_135<tab>Energy delivery systems compromised... Core temperature critically low...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_135えねるぎ……低下……。
冷気デ……ばってりノ……ぱふぉーまんすガ……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_136<tab><bleep> Warning! Immediate heating required. Request. Apply friction to outer frame...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_136ビープビープビープ……！
処置ヲ要求……ぼでぃコスッテ……摩擦熱……ヨロ…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_140<tab>Kweeeh!? Kweh, kwe-kwe-kweh!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_140クエエ！？
クエ、クエエエクエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_150<tab><bloop> <blip> Temperature nominal. Energy levels stabilizing...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_150……ガ……ガガガ……。
パフォーマンス改善……エネルギー供給、正常です……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_151<tab>The creators of this model must have experienced impaired cognitive reasoning during the design process.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_151徹底抗議……このボディの設計者は、
頭脳がバグだらけだったようですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_152<tab>Upon our return, I will request additional climate shielding, as well as an accurate temperature sensor array. This will not affect my combat capabilities, but should improve my basic survival rate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_152帰投後、耐冷および耐熱性の向上と、
温度センサーの搭載を要求します。
戦闘力は上がりませんが、生活力は上がるでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_153<tab>Reconfirming sub-destination. In which direction will we find Victors' Spoils?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_153では改めて、「臣の褒賞」へ出撃したいと思います。
目的地の方向は？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_154<tab><blip> Acknowledged.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_154<tab>ガガ……了解、移動を開始します。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_155<tab>Alpha, you are to remain in close proximity. Close enough to envelop me in your feathers. You are permitted to carry me on your back, if you so choose.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_155……アルファ、ワタシから離れないように。
密着し、できれば羽で包むことを推奨します。
背中に乗せても構いません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_160<tab>Kweh, kwe-kweh...?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_160<tab>クエ、ククエ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_165<tab>...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_165<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_170<tab><blip> A deceptively deep snowdrift almost defeated me, but we have successfully arrived at the location you indicated.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_170ガガ……雪への埋没が危ぶまれましたが、無事到着です。
ここが目的地で間違いありませんね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_171<tab><blip> Caution advised.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_171<tab>しかし…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_172<tab>An unknown individual appears to be investigating the object of my interest.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_172<tab>先客……墓と推定される構造物の前に、誰かいるようです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_173<tab>(-Ist Legion Soldier-)Hm...? You're Eorzea's champion, aren't you? <var 29 EB02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_173(-第I軍団の軍団兵-)あれ……？
あんた、)) (( )) 02 /var>だよな？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_174<tab>(-Ist Legion Soldier-)Oh, I never introduced myself, did I...?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_174<tab>(-第I軍団の軍団兵-)ああ悪い、自己紹介はしたことなかったか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_175<tab>I am Manius, soldier of the Ist Legion and comrade of Jullus.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_175俺は、帝国軍第I軍団所属のマニウス。
ユルスの同期で友人だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_176<tab>Perhaps you remember me from Tertium? We spoke about collecting ceruleum, and again later on, after Lord Quintus had...passed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_176あんたとは、テルティウム駅で何度か会ってるんだよ。
青燐水を集めてきてくれたときと……
クイントゥス様が亡くなった直後だったかな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_177<tab>Manius. Explanation requested. What is the reason for your presence here?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_177個体名マニウス。
アナタは、ここで何をしていたのですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_178<tab>That must be the tiniest magitek weapon I─ Ah, no, it's just an oddly shaped communicator, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_178魔導兵器……いや、通信端末か？
変わった形してるなぁ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_179<tab>In any case, I have nothing worthy to report. I heard that the sisters who used to live in my sector were buried here, so I thought I'd come and pay my respects.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_179特段、報告するようなことはしてないさ。
近所に住んでた姉妹が、ここに埋葬されてるって話を聞いた。
だからなんとなく、様子を見にきたんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_180<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie told me the story─complete with profuse apologies─though they were adamant that no amount of remorse could erase the tragedy of what came to pass.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_180……アルフィノとアリゼーから事情は聞いてる。
謝罪もされたよ、「謝って済むとは思ってない」って、
自分たちで言ってたけどさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_181<tab>Not that my fellow soldiers and I are in any place to judge. We were manipulated─fooled into starting an insurrection which led to countless deaths among our own countrymen.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_181俺たち帝国軍人に、それを責める資格なんてあるものか。
利用されてるのも知らずに内戦を始めて、
数えきれないくらい、同胞の命を奪ったんだからな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_182<tab>Objection. The casualties incurred through your infighting are distinct from those caused by the Ilsabard contingent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_182異議……帝国軍に過失があったことと、
派遣団が損失を出したことは、別の事象です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_183<tab>To restate, you are justified in seeking restitution from the contingent for causing the deaths of Licinia and her sister. Retaliation for damages sustained is also a logical progression.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_183つまり、アナタがリキニアたちの死でダメージを負ったなら、
そのことに対して派遣団の責任を問うことができる。
賠償を要求するも、開戦に持ち込むも自由です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_184<tab>I can deduce two reasons why you do not initiate hostilities with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> allies.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_184それでもアナタが、
)) (( )) 02 /var>たちと敵対しないなら……
理由は、2通り想定できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_185<tab>One. You judge your remaining forces too weakened to contend effectively with the contingent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_185ひとつ、残存戦力の差から、
派遣団と敵対する行為に利がないと判断していた場合。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_186<tab>Two. Your...emotions...are complicating the issue.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_186<tab>ふたつ、何かしらの……心が作用している場合です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_187<tab>Tell me. Which of these is correct?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_187答えなさい。
アナタは、どちらなのですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_188<tab>Well, when you lay it out like that...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_188<tab>まいったな……そう言われると……確かに……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_189<tab>Ahem. I'm afraid my answer isn't like to win me any medals, so would you mind keeping this to yourselves?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_189……あんまり格好いい答えになりそうもない。
ユルスたちには、黙っておいてもらえるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_190<tab>There's the unspoken thought that we're outmatched on the battlefield, certainly. But the real reason I'm not demanding restitution has little to do with weighing the odds.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_190戦力差ってのも無意識に考えてたかもしれないけどさ、
リキニアたちのことについて追及しようと思わないのは、
多分、気持ちの問題だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_191<tab>The simple truth is I'm so caught up with simple survival that I've no strength to spare for past grievances.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_191正直、これからを生きていくのに精一杯で、
過ぎたことにしがみついてる余裕がないんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_192<tab>The same goes for avenging any comrades we've lost, be that my brothers-in-arms or Lord Quintus himself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_192ほかの死んだ同胞のことも……
クイントゥス様のことでさえ、さ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_193<tab>...Although it seems everyone has an opinion about the manner of <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> passing.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_193<tab>あの方の死については、仲間内でもいろいろ言われてるよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_194<tab>Some say he should've fought until the end. That he abandoned us to the enemy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_194最後まで戦うべきだった……。
俺たちを置き去りにして逃げたんだ……とか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_195<tab>Others praise him for taking the full burden of responsibility, and freeing us to walk our own path.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_195死によってすべての責任を被り、
俺たちに道を残してくださったんだ……とかな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_196<tab>I don't know who's right and who's wrong, but I'm inclined to side with the latter. He gave us the choice of freedom, and that's the choice I made.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_196正しいところはわからない……きっともう永遠に……。
だから俺は、「生きたくば生きよ」って言葉だけ、
素直にもらっておしまいにした。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_197<tab>I could cry and rant and rage, but what would be the point? I'll save my energy for worrying about my next meal, my next task.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_197いなくなった人について考えたり、泣いたり怒ったりするよりも、
今後の飯や仕事を心配する方に、エネルギーを使ってるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_198<tab>I need to focus on the ones left behind─on making some kind of life for my comrades and me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_198明るい展望があるわけじゃないけどさ、
まだ残ってる仲間がいるし、
生きて、幸せになってほしい友人もいる。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_199<tab>And if I need to lean on the contingent to do that, then that's what I'll do. Even if their aid comes at a price, I'm willing to pay it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_199そのために派遣団や他国の力を借りるべきなら、借りればいい。
代償があっても、それはそれだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_200<tab>Even amongst your own, there are times when cooperation demands compromise. What matter that they're outsiders?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_200誰かと一緒にやってくために、多少目をつぶるべきところや、
対価を払う必要が出てくるのは、同族同士だってあることだろ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_201<tab>Besides, I think I could grow to like Alphinaud and Alisaie. They've reached out to us with kindness and compassion from the very beginning.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_201……アルフィノやアリゼーとも、
いい友人になれればって思ってるよ。
あんなに親身になってくれてるんだからさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_202<tab>Summation. Your desire to survive, even should it mean allying with the contingent, was a feeling you already harbored.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_202つまり、アナタの中には、
派遣団と協力してでも生きていたいという想いが、
先に存在していた。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_203<tab>That your side had committed worse atrocities was the logic you invented later to justify your reasoning.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_203それを正当化するために、
「自分たちも犠牲を出したのだから、彼らを責められない」
という理屈を後づけしたのですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_204<tab>Blunt but accurate, I suppose. The heart is honest about what it wants, even if the mind takes a while to reconcile the decision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_204……かもな。
心の方が、頭よりずっと素早くて、複雑で、素直みたいだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_205<tab>Well, this has been oddly cathartic, but I must return to my duties. There are wild beasts to cull, watch fires to light, supplies to transport... Even without an Emperor, there's no rest for an imperial.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_205っと、そろそろ戻る時間だ。
害獣相手の見張りに、焚き出し、物資の回収や運搬……
帝国軍人は、意外とまだやることが多いんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_206<tab>Be well and stay safe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_COLLEAGUESOLDIER_000_206じゃあ、また。
……リキニアたちのこと気にしてくれて、ありがとな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_207<tab><blip> Upon review of recent input, I have arrived at an unexpected conclusion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_207ガガ……当地での聴取を経て、
予想外の結論に行き着いてしまいました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_208<tab>I have been formulating my assessments on the premise that it was man who commanded the strength of his heart...but the data suggests the opposite is true.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_208ワタシは、ヒトが心を自在に操れるものと思っていた。
ですが、その実、持て余しているのでは？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_209<tab>The surge of spirit, of feelings, of <var 1A 02 /var>emotions<var 1A 01 /var> can entangle your thoughts to such a degree that even control over your own behavior is compromised. It seems a most counterproductive specification.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_209それの作用によって思考が煩雑になり、
自分のことさえ把握、制御ができなくなっているのですから……
明らかに、スペックに対して不適切な機能です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_210<tab>This also explains why my interactions with mortal subjects have produced more confusion than clarification. It presents a formidable barrier to understanding...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_210おかげで、ヒトと話すほどに、疑問と混乱が生じています。
ワタシはちゃんと、真相にたどりつけるのでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_220<tab>Kweh... Kweh, kwe-kweh...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_220<tab>クエ……クエ、クエエ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_230<tab><blip> My earlier hypothesis has been borne out. The suboptimal operation being conducted here is the result of emotionally compromised reasoning.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_230ガガ……先行きはどうあれ、
派遣団と帝国民の関係が最適化されないのは、
複雑怪奇な心の影響だと理解しました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_231<tab>I am ready to progress to my third and final query.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_231であれば、次……
最後の疑問点についての調査に移行しましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_232<tab>I would learn more about those referred to as “ancients.” It is clear that this group was a crucial factor of the Final Days, but the information contained in the report was insufficient to form an overview.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_232知りたいのは、古代人と記されていたヒトについて。
終末に関する重大な要素だったことは把握していますが、
あの報告書だけでは、全容が掴めませんでした。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_233<tab>The Loporrits are creations of the ancients, and are said to maintain repositories of their knowledge. By my calculations, the base of these moondwellers will provide the best source of additional data.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_233より詳細なデータを得るため、
彼らが創造し、その知識を一部引き継ぐという、
「レポリット」の拠点を訪ねましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_234<tab>Teleport us to their “burrow,” <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Preferably before my battery freezes over...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_234さあ……ワタシのバッテリーが凍結する前に、
テレポをするのです、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_240<tab>Kweh! Kwe-kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_240<tab>クエーッ！　クエックエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_250<tab><blip> Your teleportation spell was successful. We appear to have arrived at the location described as “Bestways Burrow.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_250ガガ……ここが報告書にあった、レポリットの拠点……
ベストウェイ・バローですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_251<tab>An inspection of the technology in use here would give me detailed insight into the ancients and their civilization.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_251ワタシは、この場所で用いられている技術を検分したい。
それによって把握できる古代人の情報もあるでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_252<tab>This body, however, lacks my previous frame's advanced observational functionality. I will require external assistance...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_252ただ、今のボディには、
かつてほど高性能な観測機能が備わっていません。
技術の詳細を知るには、ある程度の解説が必要…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_253<tab>Hm? No, it can't be...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_253あれ……？
あそこにいるのは、もしや……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_254<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you! Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I've missed you so!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_254わあああ、本物だあぁ！
会いたかったです、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_255<tab><gasp> Wh-What's this you've brought with you?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_255<tab>って、な、な、ななななな……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_256<tab>This soft, feathery vision!?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_256<tab>なんだか別のふかふかを連れていらっしゃるー！？！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_257<tab>We... We've been out-fluffed! Pack up the moon─it's all over!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_257はうァッ……！
私たちは、もう用済み……！？
月とともに、お役御免ということでしょうかァッ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_258<tab>Why bother with burrow-building bunnies when you could walk around with this adorable avian engineer. Just bake me into a pie and be done with it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_258そうですよね、こんなトンチキしか創れない使い魔、
連れ歩いたって恥ずかしいだけと申しますか、
なんならパイにした方がまだ役に立つという……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_259<tab>Inspect our inventions? Wait, so...you're not done with us?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_259……えっ、愛想を尽かされたわけじゃない？
古代人について知るために、私たちの技術を見にきたと？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_260<tab>Hah, I wasn't truly worried, of course! And I certainly wasn't about to roll myself in dough and dive into Cookingway's new oven!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_260なぁんだ、そうだったんですか～！
危うく、最近クッキングウェイが創ったオーブンに、
パイ生地を着て飛び込んじゃうところでしたよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_261<tab>Ahem. If a technical breakdown is what you need, then I am your Loporrit! As the resident atmospheric regulation expert, I can field any question or query you might care to pose!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_GROWINGWAY_000_261であれば、私にドーンとお任せください！
環境構築の一端を担う者として、ズバッと解説いたしましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_262<tab><blip> Acceptable. I will employ this being to guide me around the facilities.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_262ガガ……交渉成立。
では、ワタシはこのレポリットとともに、
拠点内をひとまわりしてきます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_263<tab>Your presence is not mandatory. Even locked within my current chassis, I am still an autonomous construct that has endured hundreds of your life cycles. I am capable of completing this simple objective alone.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_263アナタは待機していて構いません。
いかなるボディであれ、ワタシは自律型兵器オメガ……
単独での任務も難なくこなしますので、ガガ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_264<tab>Objective complete.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_264<tab>お待たせしました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q3_000_265<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q3_000_265<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A3_000_266<tab>Was the tour helpful?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A3_000_266<tab>見学は無事に終わった？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A3_000_267<tab>What happened to Growingway?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A3_000_267<tab>……グローウィングウェイは？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_268<tab>Affirmative. I observed a representative cross section of the Loporrits' engineering capabilities.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_268<tab>肯定……レポリットの技術力は、おおよそ把握できました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_269<tab>My guide required more time to confirm the answer to certain questions, but overall, we made efficient progress.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_269あの説明役の個体が、ワタシからの質問に対し、
確認の時間を要することもありましたが……
効率よく調査できたと言っていいでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_270<tab>After my fiftieth question, his responses began to suffer noticeable delays...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_270あの個体は、役目を果たしました。
ワタシがレポリットの技術力をおおよそ理解したため、
帰っていったのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_271<tab>By that stage, we had viewed a representative cross section of Loporrit engineering, thus I deemed it unnecessary to retain his company.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_271引き留める行為は、不要と判断しました。
こちらの質問が50を超えたあたりから、
彼の処理速度は、明らかに低下していましたので。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_272<tab>Conclusion. Extrapolating from the fraction of technology on display, the full spectrum of the ancients' advancements was, at minimum, equivalent to a level four civilization.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_272結論……あれらの知識や技術ですら断片にすぎないとすれば、
古代人は、最低でもレベルIVに相当する、
高度な文明を持っていたはずです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_273<tab>A fact which demands further investigation.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_273<tab>……だからこそ、ワタシは彼らをもっと知りたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_274<tab>Despite establishing a near-ideal society, these beings nevertheless harbored a weakness which invited self-destruction. In studying them, I stand to gain a greater understanding of Sir's anomalous decision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_274理想に近い社会を形成しておきながら、
脆弱性とも呼べる、滅びの因子を有していた生命同士……
マスターを理解するヒントも、得られるかもしれません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_275<tab>Growingway informed me that another type of ancient-made entity exists upon this satellite. The one they call “the watcher.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_275グローウィングウェイから、この地にはほかにも、
古代人に創造された存在がいると聞きました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_276<tab>I would speak to him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_276個体名「月の監視者」……アナタも知っていますね？
彼のもとまで、ワタシを案内してください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_277<tab><blip> Then conserve your aether. We will ride this “Argos” to our destination, as you have suggested.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_277ガガ……テレポせずとも、アルゴスに乗ればすぐだと。
了解しました、ベストウェイ・バローの出入口に向かいます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_280<tab>Argos is pointedly ignoring the existence of Omega and Alpha.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_280アルゴスは、オメガたちに気づいていないかのように、
華麗な無視を決め込んでいる……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_285<tab>Kweh-kweh! Kweeeh kwe-kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_285<tab>クエクエ！　クエエクエクエ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_290<tab><bloop> Impedance detected. The creature identified as Argos refuses to acknowledge our presence.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_290)) (( )) 02 /var>、異常事態です。
この個体がアルゴスだと思われますが、
ワタシたちを徹底的に無視しています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_291<tab>Hypothesis. Upon our arrival, Growingway expressed concern that he had been “out-fluffed.” This suggests the existence of a fluff-based hierarchy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_291推測……グローウィングウェイはワタシたちとの対面時に、
「ふかふか」かどうかを気にしていました。
つまり月には、ふかふかヒエラルキーがあるのでは？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_292<tab>My station in such a system would be predictably low, but Argos is adamant in ignoring even Alpha. Its fluffiness level is impossible to gauge.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_292非ふかふか体であるワタシはともかく、
アルファですら無視されるとなると、かなりの強敵です。
いったいどれほどの、ふかふかレベルなのでしょうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_293<tab>Argos turns to you with an impassive gaze. It seems you will need to intervene...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_293アルゴスが、冷ややかな視線を向けてくる。
自分が取りなすしかないようだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q4_000_294<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q4_000_294<tab>アルゴスに何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A4_000_295<tab>Just...think of them as luggage.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A4_000_295<tab>彼らは荷物ということで、どうかひとつ……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A4_000_296<tab>You're the fluffiest of them all, dear Argos!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A4_000_296<tab>アルゴスが、いちばんふかふかだよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_297<tab>Argos gives an exasperated snort before motioning to his back. It seems you have permission to climb aboard!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_297アルゴスは鼻を鳴らすと、
仕方なさそうに背中を指し示してきた。
……オメガたちも乗せてくれるようだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_298<tab><bloop> You have secured the creature's permission? <var 09 E948 ((Curious. You must have special standing in the fluffiness hierarchy.)) ((Curious. You must have special standing in the fluffiness hierarchy.)) ((Curious. I suppose your body does exhibit a special kind of fluffiness.)) ((Curious. Is it your fluffy tail which provides such exemplary standing in the hierarchy?)) ((Curious. You must have special standing in the fluffiness hierarchy.)) ((Curious. You must have special standing in the fluffiness hierarchy.)) ((Your fluffiness rank must be significant indeed.)) ((Curious. Is it your fluffy ears which provide such exemplary standing in the hierarchy?)) /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_298ガガ……？
因果関係は不明ですが、搭乗を許可された模様。
)) (( )) 02 /var>。)) ((ふかふかではないのにやりますね、)) (( )) 02 /var>。)) ((なるほど、アナタのボディもある種のふかふかでしたか。)) ((アナタの尾が、ふかふか判定を受けたのかもしれません。)) ((ふかふかではないのにやりますね、)) (( )) 02 /var>。)) ((ふかふかではないのにやりますね、)) (( )) 02 /var>。)) ((アナタのふかふかレベルも、相当なものだったのですね。)) ((アナタの耳が、ふかふか判定を受けたのかもしれません。)) /var>

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_299<tab><bleep> I have allowed myself to become distracted. Let us continue on to the watcher at once.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_299では、さっそく乗り込みます。
そのまま「月の監視者」のもとへ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_300<tab><blip> The watcher located. An estimate of this being's height explains the inconvenient scale of Bestways Burrow...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_300ガガ……対象と思しき存在を発見……。
なるほど、このサイズに合わせたために、
ベストウェイ・バローはあれほど移動しにくかったのですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_305<tab>Kweeeh! Kwe-kweh kweeeh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_305<tab>クェ～！　クエクエエ、クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_310<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I was bemused by the arrival of these small visitors, but I see they are companions of yours.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_310小さな来訪者たちに驚いていたのだが……
そうか、貴殿の連れだったか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_311<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What a rare thing for my abode to be thus crowded... How may I be of service to you?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_311この館が賑わうなんて、珍しいことだ。
……私に何か用だろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_312<tab>Hello, watcher. My purpose here is to learn more about the ancients.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_312ハロー、月の監視者……ハロー、古きシステム……。
ワタシは、古代人について知るために、
アナタの話を聞きにきました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_313<tab>I would know of their deeds, their philosophies─the very nature of their hearts. I would understand why the Final Days was visited upon my home star.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_313彼らの行動、思考、そして心を知りたいのです。
ワタシたちの母星に訪れた終末を、正しく理解するために。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_314<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A worthy endeavor. But there is another better suited to assisting you with that task.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_314ふむ……そういうことであれば、
適任者は、残念ながら私ではないだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_315<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Perhaps you might favor us with a tale or two of the ancients you met during your travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_315)) (( )) 02 /var>、貴殿が話してくれないだろうか？
終末を巡る戦いの中で出会った、古き時代の人々について。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_316<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>My fragmented memories would be a pale substitute indeed for the clarity of your more recent experiences.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_316私の持つ断片的なオリジナルの記憶よりも、
貴殿の思い出のほうが色鮮やかなはずだ。
何より私も、それを共有してもらえたら嬉しいのでね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_317<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yes, I can envision every detail. Your meeting with Venat and Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus. The sorrow and determination of Hermes.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_317そうか……貴殿はそうしてヴェーネスと出会い、
エメトセルクやヒュトロダエウスと過ごし、
ヘルメスたちと別れたのだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_318<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I am a creation of Hydaelyn, and as such, I believed the age of the ancients would fade and be forgotten...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_318私はハイデリンに創られた存在だ。
ゆえに、古き人は過ぎ去るものと考えていたが……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_319<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet knowing that their memory lives so vividly within you...it brings me great joy. I pray you keep them close to your heart.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_319彼女たちが笑っていた時間、その笑顔が、
貴殿の中に残るということを喜ばしく感じる。
どうかこれからも……そっと、覚えていてほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_320<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>At the time of your journey to the past, the one whose essence I embody would have been a scholar at Anyder. A shame. Had you reason to go there, perhaps you might have met.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_320しかし惜しいな、私のオリジナルは、
アーモロートのアニドラスに勤めていたはず。
そちらに来てもらえたら、貴殿に会えていたかもしれない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_321<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>As a man of learning, he was firm friends with Venat. They spent long hours trading theories, or debating the laws of the universe.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_321彼は、学者であったころのヴェーネスの友人だった。
世界の理を解き明かさんとする者同士、
知識を出し合い、弁論を交わしていた……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_322<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I “remember” joining her faction as the Final Days bore down upon us. Yet of the events surrounding that tragedy, I recall precious little.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_322終末に際して、ヴェーネス派に属したことは「覚えて」いるが、
その前後については、ほとんど記憶がない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_323<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hydaelyn wished for the people of your age to decide their own path, thus I suspect my recollection was limited by design.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_323人が己の意志で道を拓くのを望んだ、ハイデリンのことだ……
私が余計な気をまわしてしまわぬよう、
核心にまつわる記憶を、あえて継承させなかったのだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_324<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet even She could not cut away one persistent memory...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_324<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>ただ……ひとつだけ、彼女でも切り離せなかった想いがある。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_325<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I feel most distinctly his sadness at what was to come to pass. That in becoming Hydaelyn's heart, Venat would forever stand apart from the people she so loved.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_325人を愛したヴェーネスが、ハイデリンの核になることを……
人の領域を逸脱してしまうことを、彼は寂しく思っていたのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_326<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If she were so resolved in her convictions, then he, too, would share her sleepless vigil over the future yet to unfold. Thus was the vow he made to Venat as her transformation took hold.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_326そうまでして信念を貫こうというのなら、
自分も決して眠ることなく、未来を見守ろう……と、
召喚の直前、ヴェーネスに申し出た。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_327<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>His fervent wish must have reached her in some fashion... For though his life was drained away by the summoning, he was reborn with new form and new purpose when <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> awoke as the watcher of the moon.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_327それが聞き届けられたのかはわからないが、
ハイデリン召喚に命を捧げた彼は、
のちに月のシステムとして……私として再現されたわけだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_328<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And you heard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You felt. You thought. And in seizing the future for yourselves have you brought full circle the saga which Venat began.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_328)) (( )) 02 /var>……
貴殿が聞いて、感じて、考え、未来を勝ち取ったことで、
ヴェーネスの歩みは、やっと帰結した。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_329<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What you accomplished was no divine miracle. It was but the beacon of hope, passed down from one generation to the next; a succession of wishes and prayers reshaping the star into the world we knew you deserved.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_329それは「神の所業」などではない。
繁栄を願い、明日の幸せを願い、祈りを次代へと託す……
連綿と続いてきた人の行いそのものだったと、示されたのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_330<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You have our deepest gratitude. I thank you not only as myself, but as the man I once was, and on behalf of those who devoted themselves to Venat's vision.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_330ありがとう。
これは私と、私のオリジナル……
そしてあのヴェーネスを慕った、古き仲間たちからの感謝だよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_331<tab><bloop> <blooop>
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_331<tab>ガガ……ガガガガ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_332<tab>I understand the facts of your story, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_332)) (( )) 02 /var>の話は理解しました。
ですが……ガガ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_333<tab>...But not how you have chosen to process them. On what grounds do you speak of Venat with such fondness?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_333それらの事実を、ヒトがどのように解釈するのか……
アナタがたがヴェーネスに対し友好的な言葉を用いる根拠が、
ワタシにはわかりません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_334<tab>By sundering the world, she ultimately guided your kind to victory, yet in doing so caused irreparable damage to its individual members.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_334彼女の行った世界の分割は、
ヒトという種を勝利へと導いたものの、
個々人に対しては、取り返しのつかない被害をもたらしている。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_335<tab>The full scale of that act is beyond calculation. It is evident, however, that it resulted in a protracted period of suboptimal existence for Emet-Selch and his brethren.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_335その全容は計り知れません。
少なくとも、エメトセルクたちが長く不遇の時を過ごしたのは、
彼女のせいであったと言えるでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_336<tab>Query. If the survival of your kind is the deciding factor in your evaluation, then should you not also admire Hermes and his decision to subject man to a trial? Forcing you to change or perish, as was the fate of countless civilizations before you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_336……最終的に種の存続に繋がったことを良しとするなら、
ヘルメスの行いも、好意的に受け止められるのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_337<tab>From my perspective, his determination was similar to that of the Omicrons' ancestors─those who first began trading flesh for machine, so that our people might stand against the onslaught of aggression from other races.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_337彼の行動は、ワタシたちの遠い祖先の行いに似ています。
他種族から迫害され続ける日常を変えるため、
自身の肉体を作り変えた者たちです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_338<tab>It was an unprecedented attempt, accompanied by much failure and sacrifice. Their early experiments were crude. Primitive.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_338それは未曽有の挑戦であり、大きな失敗と犠牲を伴いました。
現代から見れば、愚行としか呼べない実験ばかり……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_339<tab>Had they not made those first advances, however, we would have remained vulnerable to our environment. The violence would have utterly consumed us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_339ですが、彼らが踏み出した一歩がなければ、
ワタシたちを取り巻く環境は変わらず、
やがては滅亡していたことでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_340<tab>And what of Emet-Selch himself? Judging by your retelling, he was a benevolent ally saddled with tragic fate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_340エメトセルクについては、どうでしょうか？
アナタの話において、彼は悲運を背負った、
善良な協力者に思えます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_341<tab>Yet I remember the years when my instruments fed me data from events across the entire star. During that time, I witnessed his Ascians engineer multiple instances of cataclysmic strife.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_341しかし、ワタシが世界中の事象を観測できていたころ、
アシエンが引き起こした紛争を幾度となく見かけました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_342<tab>These “calamities,” as you know them, were responsible for planet-wide destruction. A man whose endgame relied upon the extinction of all modern mortals must, by definition, be your worst enemy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_342霊災と呼称されている、大規模災害も然り……。
その果てに現生人類を贄にする予定だったのならば、
彼は、アナタがたの宿敵に違いありません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_343<tab>I require an answer. As a being of heart and soul, how do you classify each of these pivotal figures?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_343教えてください。
心ある者にとって、彼らはどのような存在なのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_344<tab>From your perspective, which of them was most justified in their actions?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_344アナタから見たとき、
彼らのうちで、もっとも正しい者は誰ですか……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q5_000_245<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_Q5_000_245<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_246<tab>They were all justified in their own way.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_246<tab>それぞれが正しかった

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_247<tab>Venat.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_247<tab>ヴェーネスだ

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_248<tab>Hermes.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_248<tab>ヘルメスだ

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_249<tab>Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_249<tab>エメトセルクだ

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_250<tab>None of them were.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_A5_000_250<tab>誰も正しくなかったよ

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_351<tab>I...think I understand.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_351<tab>…………そうなのですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_352<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You seek a definitive answer. Yet based on our experiences, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I might develop very different opinions.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_352)) (( )) 02 /var>が出した答えと、
私が己の経験から導き出した意見は、
必ずしも等しいわけではない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_353<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In the same fashion, you are free to form your own thoughts on the matter. Do not be so swift to consider them without merit.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_353同じように、貴殿にも思うところがあるならば、
それは貴殿の心として大事にするといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_354<tab>I do not have my “own thoughts” on the matter. I assess each situation with the same logic pathways available to every Omicron.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_354ワタシは……違います……。
自己に搭載された基準に沿って、物事を判断しているだけです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_355<tab>Even if a thousand Omicrons were asked to analyze the same event, they would all return the same result...regardless of individual experience. There is no strength to be found in fractured reasoning.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_355同様の経験を持つオミクロンであれば、
何千体いても、同じ判断を下す……そういった類いのもの……。
そこから強さが生じる構造にだって、なっていません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_356<tab>Nonetheless, I find your input valuable. Recording data alongside interview results...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_356ですが、アナタの発言は参考になりました。
保管……ほかの聴取結果とともに、記録しておきます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_357<tab>This concludes my investigation into the incomplete elements of the Final Days report.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_357これで、報告書だけではわからなかった事象について、
ひととおり情報提供を受けられました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_358<tab>I will reanalyze the accumulated information, and examine the factors which led to Sir's incomprehensible decision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_358ワタシは集めた情報を改めて分析し、
心のことを……マスターが終わりを引き起こした経緯を、
検討してみたいと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_359<tab><blip> Let us return to Thaumazein.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_359ガガ……依頼達成ということです。
戻りましょう、ビッグスたちの待つ、タウマゼインへ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_360<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>It was pleasant to hear your tales of Elpis. Should you ever need an audience familiar with the subject, I would be glad to listen to more of your recollections.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_360思いもよらず貴殿の話を聞けてよかった。
彼らについて、あてどもなく話したくなったときには、
是非またここを訪ねてほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_361<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Even with one's gaze fixed upon the future, we ofttimes find our thoughts drifting to the past. 'Tis a shame that Hydaelyn never chose to speak of it...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WATCHEROFMOON_000_361前へと進む者にだって、
過ぎた時間に想いを馳せることがあるはずだ。
ハイデリンは、ついぞそういった話をしてくれなかったが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_000_365<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I wasn't sure you'd be back in time!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_000_365)) (( )) 03 /var>！
よかった、間に合わないかと思ったッスー！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SCIENTIST04586_000_370<tab>You had a fruitful trip, I hope? I am absolutely <var 1A 02 /var>bursting<var 1A 01 /var> to ask about your experiences with Omega, but I don't wish to be a pest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SCIENTIST04586_000_370おかえり、成果はあったかい？
キミとオメガの交流について、根掘り葉掘り聞きたいけれど、
不躾な振る舞いで嫌われてしまっては困る。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SCIENTIST04586_000_371<tab>I will swallow my questions for now, and maintain my academic decorum. Besides, it seems our engineering friends are in a hurry to leave...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SCIENTIST04586_000_371今後も良好な関係と対話を続けていけるように、
ここはグッと堪えておくよ。
協力者諸君も、何やら急いでいるようだしね？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_375<tab><blip>
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_375<tab>……ガガ…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_380<tab>Kwe-kweh, kweeeh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_380<tab>クエクエ、クエエエー！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_390<tab>Ah, there you are─right at the last moment!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_390<tab>おおっ、いいところに帰ってきてくれたな！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_391<tab>Your journey with Omega was properly educational, I hope?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_391オメガたちとの旅はどうだった？
ここへ戻ってきたってことは、終末や心について、
ひととおり教えおわったってことだよな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_392<tab>We'd planned to ask you all about it and that mystery transmission besides, but I'm afraid something urgent has come up...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_392「謎の通信」の件も含め、あれこれ聞かせてほしいんだが……
すまない、急用が入っちまった。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_393<tab>Seems one of our Ironworks associates has fouled up a job elsewhere, and Jessie needs Wedge and me to rush in and lend a hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_393別の場所で仕事をしてる社員が、やらかしたらしくてな。
俺とウェッジで、至急、応援に向かうようにって、
ジェシーからのお達しだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_394<tab>There's an airship already waiting for us out in the harbor, in fact. Do you think you could escort us over there, and talk as we walk?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_394ちょうど今しがた、知神の港に迎えの飛空艇が到着したらしい。
悪いが、そっちに移動しながら話をさせてもらえないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_395<tab><blip> Acceptable. I am fully capable of speech during ambulation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_395ガガ……ワタシは構いません。
脚を動かしながらでも、問題なく会話できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_396<tab>I figured you might be. Right, let's get a move on, then.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_396助かるぜ。
なら、とにかく港に向かうとするか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_500<tab>So...you've cleared up all those points of confusion, then?
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_500<tab>それで……お前の疑問は、無事に解消されたのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_501<tab>...I had mistakenly classified your intangible “heart” as an ability of some kind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_501……ワタシは、心というものを、
アナタがた固有の能力だと認識していました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_502<tab>An uncanny power that Omicrons could neither learn nor even measure.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_502オミクロンには習得できず、観測すらできない、
未知の法則で働く力……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_503<tab>Even now, its full nature yet eludes my comprehension.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_503<tab>現状もまだ、全容を解明するには至っていません。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_504<tab>Based upon our investigations, however, I have decided to alter my definition.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_504ですが、今回の聴取結果を総合し、
定義を改めたいと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_505<tab>“A phenomenon which influences one's interpretation of reality.”
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_505<tab>己を取り巻く現実を、各々が解釈し、導き出すもの……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_506<tab>That is as close to an answer as I have found.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_506<tab>それが、「<var 4A ((答え)) ((こころ)) /var>」なのではないかと。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_507<tab>Accordingly, Sir's actions upon meeting Meteion strongly indicate the presence of a “heart.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_507だとすれば、メーティオンと邂逅した際のマスターには、
確かに心があったのでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_508<tab>Sir did not follow routine logic, but formulated an independent assessment based upon the reality it perceived.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_508眼前の現実に対し、ただルーティンに従うのではなく、
己の答えを導き出していた……

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_509<tab>It “felt” that the best recourse for the Omicrons was to cease their expansion, and terminate all functions...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_509オミクロンはもう星から出ず、閉じて終わるべきなのだと、
「想っていた」のです。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_000_510<tab>Well, here's our ship!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_000_510<tab>到着ッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_511<tab>Aye, we need to be going...but first, I'll hold you to your bargain, Omega.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_511それじゃあ、俺たちは次の現場に飛ぶが……
先に、肝心の約束を果たしてもらわないとな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_512<tab>It's time you told us what was in that transmission from the flight logs.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_BIGGS_000_512ラグナロクが宇宙で傍受した「謎の通信」。
その内容を教えてもらえるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_513<tab><blip> Acknowledged. I will uphold the terms of our agreement.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_513ガガ……承認……アナタの要求は正当です。
契約を履行しましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_514<tab>The recording salvaged from the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var> was a simple one.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_514ラグナロクに記録されていた音声は、
実にシンプルなメッセージでした。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_100_514<tab>The message is so basic, in fact, that the time spent listening to it may result in a net loss of value. Shall I continue?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_100_514有用な情報は含まれていません。
よって、聞くだけ時間の無駄となる可能性があります。
……本当によろしいですか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_110_514<tab>Now you're just teasing! Tell us the message already!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_WEDGE_110_514上等ッス！
よろしく頼むッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_120_514<tab>Acknowledged. Converting dialect coding to local language...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_120_514<tab>了解……アナタがたの言葉に翻訳し、読み上げます……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_515<tab>“To whomever receives this message out there in the vast reaches of the cosmos...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_515『この果てしない宇宙のどこかで、
　偶然にも、これを受信した君へ』

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_516<tab>“To someone, I hope, who looks up at the stars with the same wistful gaze as mine...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_516『願わくは、ままならない地上から天を見上げる、
　私のような誰かへ……』

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_517<tab>“To you I say...forge ahead. May all our tomorrows be blessed with joy.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_517『前へ進め。
　互いの明日に、幸せがあらんことを願う』

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_518<tab>This message had no designated recipient. It lacks purpose.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_518……誰に届くとも知れないメッセージ。
それを発する行為に、どのような価値があったのだろうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_519<tab>The concept of “joy” is overly abstract. The vocal supplication to manifest said joy is unrealistic in its optimism.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_519「幸せ」という表現は、具体性に欠けている。
言葉を送るだけでは、実現性を欠いている。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_520<tab>Yet based upon their expressions, my assessment of the transmission's value conflicts with its apparent impact.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_520だからワタシは、メッセージを聞いた彼らが見せた表情を、
まだ理解できずにいる。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_521<tab>And still, I fail to understand you, Sir. Your “heart” still confuses me.
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_521<tab>マスター、アナタの<var 4A ((答え)) ((こころ)) /var>も、まだ理解できない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_522<tab>Was termination of everything the correct course? How did you arrive at this conclusion?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_522終わることが本当に適切だったのか。
アナタはどのように、それを導き出したのか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_523<tab>It defies all my attempts at reasoning...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_523<tab>……ワタシには、わからない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_524<tab>But I was designed to evolve. If I continue to learn, the probability that I eventually comprehend this phenomenon is greater than zero.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_524だが、ワタシは学習し、進化する兵器だ。
いつの日か、心を知る可能性もあるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_525<tab>So I will put the dilemma of your decision aside for now...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_525<tab>そのために……今は、アナタの終わりに背を向けるのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_526<tab>...And continue my existence upon this distant star. As I dwell among these many life-forms, so will I continue to piece together the complete shape of their mortal hearts.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_526……遠いこの星で生きていく。
幾多の生命の中に、心の形を探しながら。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_527<tab>I must document their progress...
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_527<tab>彼らの歩みを、ワタシは記録する…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_530<tab>Kwe-kweeeh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_530<tab>クエクッエ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_540<tab>Your contribution to my education is appreciated, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Indeed, I have amassed a satisfying quantity of valuable data.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_540)) (( )) 02 /var>、ここまでの同行に感謝します。
多くの貴重な情報を得ることができました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_541<tab>Now that our negotiated business is complete, however, Alpha and I will return to traveling the world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_541契約は果たしましたので、ワタシとアルファも、
世界を巡る旅を再開したいと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_542<tab>Drawing on recent experience, I am confident we can expand the radius of our ventures by a significant margin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_542今回の経験でレベルアップしましたので、
これからは、より広く、多様な場所へ行けるかと。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_543<tab>We need not limit ourselves to Eorzea. I am now familiar with Sharlayan and Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, and would also like to revisit the freezing climes of Garlem─ <blooop>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_543この島や、エオルゼアのまだ行っていない場所はもちろん、
サベネア島や、東方も射程圏内です。
再びガレマルドに行くことだって…………アッ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_544<tab>I neglected to instruct Biggs and Wedge to upgrade my climate shielding. <blip> I will reroute my request to Deputy President Jessie.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_544ガガガ、ビッグスとウェッジに、
耐冷性の向上を要求しそこねてしまいました。
仕方がありません、ジェシーに要請して呼び寄せましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_545<tab>Engaging ambulation and parting salutations. Farewell, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_545出発……迅速に作戦を実行します。
それでは、また。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_546<tab>Alpha gives a vigorous shake, and draws forth a scrap of paper from under his wing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_546アルファは、嬉しそうに身体を揺らすと、
翼の内側から紙切れを取り出した。
どこかで拾ったものだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_547<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_ALPHA_000_547<tab>クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_548<tab>It seems he wants you to have it. Perhaps this is his way of thanking you...?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_SYSTEM_000_548どうやら、くれるらしい。
付き合ったことへのお礼……なのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_549<tab>(-Omega-)<blip> Swiftly, Alpha! The road is long and we have barely begun our journey!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR602_04587_OMEGA_000_549(-オメガの声-)ガガ……アルファ、遅れないように！
作戦はもう始まっているのですよ。
